description: Your cluster's installation was blocked by an invalid subnet selection error. The error was: '${HIVE_INSTALL_ERROR}' Please check the subnets provided in the platform.aws.subnets parameter during installation. AWS VPC/Subnet requirements are described in this document, Table 3: Optional AWS Parameters - https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/4.7/installing/installing_aws/installing-aws-network-customizations.html#installation-configuration-parameters_installing-aws-network-customizations
